author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
I've been worried for the GNOME Foundation for a long time now, it's been miss step after miss step but with the new Executive Director, I actually have hope for the foundation and for the change that needs to happen to occur.

==========Support The Channel==========

► Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal
► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay

Steven Blog Post: https://blogs.gnome.org/steven/2025/05/06/introducing-myself/
Richard Blog Post: https://blogs.gnome.org/richardlitt/2025/05/02/so-long-and-thanks-for-all-the-fish/
Ho
title: GNOME's Future Looks Bright For Once
